name: 海之呼唤
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/CalloftheSea_Steam_Description_Logo_Still.png?t=1700123424[/img]

1934年，诺拉的先生与探险队失踪之后音讯全无，为了寻找他们的下落，她远渡重洋，来到了南太平洋偏远的水域，踏上了一座郁郁葱葱、天堂一般的岛。这个地方没有名字，脱离了世人的记忆，岛上随处可见某个失落文明的踪迹。

这里到底藏着怎样的蹊跷？诺拉会在这里发现怎样的真相？

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/CalloftheSea_Steam_Description_Explore_ZH-CN.png?t=1700123424[/img]
探索风景壮丽的热带岛屿（虚幻4精细建模），领略令人赞叹的景致，随处可见失落的遗迹和玄奥的神秘。

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/COTS_05.gif?t=1700123424[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/CalloftheSea_Steam_Description_Norah_ZH-CN.png?t=1700123424[/img]
亲身感受一个女人的喜乐悲欢，与她一同调查先生失踪的真相，查明自己真实的身份，Cissy Jones（《Firewatch》与《行尸走肉：第1季》配音演员）全程献声。

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/COTS_07.gif?t=1700123424[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/CalloftheSea_Steam_Description_Dive_ZH-CN.png?t=1700123424[/img]
全心感受这场冒险的悲欢离合与古怪离奇。

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/COTS_01.gif?t=1700123424[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/CalloftheSea_Steam_Description_Search_ZH-CN.png?t=1700123424[/img]
仔细调查各类线索，解开各种精妙的谜题，了解岛上发生的事情。

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1042490/extras/COTS_08.gif?t=1700123424[/img]
